mapper.insert:
insert into Member ( M_NUM, M_ID, M_PASS, M_NAME, M_NICK, M_EMAIL, M_AUTH_LEVEL, M_GENDER, M_BIRTH, M_TEL, M_ZIPCODE, M_ADDR1, M_ADDR2, M_LEVEL, M_EXP, M_RECENT_LOGIN_DATE, M_IP, M_OUT, M_IS_OUT, M_JOIN_DATE ) values ( mem_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{mPass}, #{mName}, #{mNick}, #{mEmail}, #{mAuthLevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mGender}, #{mBirth, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mTel}, #{mZipcode}, #{mAddr1}, #{mAddr2}, #{mLevel, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mExp, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mRecentLoginDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mIp}, #{mOut, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mIsOut, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{mJoinDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
)
